Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Client
public class Client extends Object
Allows to run the client application that allows to play the game as a client.

  • Method Details

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Allows report disconnection from the server to the user. This method bring the user to the connection interface so that they can retry connection.

    • getInstance

      public static Client getInstance()
      Returns a reference to the Client object

      Retrieves the local view
      Returns:

    • getServerHandler

      public ServerHandler getServerHandler()
      Retrieves the local server handler
      Returns:
      the local ServerHandler

    • setServerHandler

      public void setServerHandler(ServerHandler serverHandler)
      Allows to set the Client's ServerHandler. Used when the player select the protocol and the server's data. If the connection fails, this method will report the error to the user.
      Parameters:
      serverHandler - ServerHandler that will manage communication with the server (mostly outbound)

    • confirmUIInitialized

      public void confirmUIInitialized()
      Allows to let the Client know that the user interface has been successfully initialized
